title: Uncovering fast solid-acid proton conductors based on dynamics of polyanion groups and proton bonding strength
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01219D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pjotrs Žguns, Konstantin Klyukin, Louis S. Wang, Grace Xiong, Ju Li, Sossina M. Haile, Bilge Yildiz
Cation lattice flexibility and covalent bond lengths serve as good physical descriptors of proton conduction in solid acids and enable the discovery of promising proton conductors beyond traditional chemistries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
